name: Project Mindspace
description:
Team Name (solo developer): Overcore games 

Controls (You can see all the controls in-game):

  • Turn with Mouse
  • Move with WASD
  • Crouch: Left CTRL
  • Sprint: Left SHIFT
  • Jump: SPACEBAR
  • Light: L
  • Interact: E
  • Shoot: LMB
  • Aim/Zoom: RMB
  • Menu: ESC

Assets creted from 0 for the 2021 Megajam:

  • Drone flight mechanics with player tracking (all is physics simulated using the directional velocity and angular velocity with a high linear and angular damping)
  • The entire Main menu and in-game menu with player location, level, graphics and audio save files
  • Turret rotation and player tracking on 2 axis (up/down and left/right)

Known bugs:

  • When you first open the game because there is no save file created you can't change the volume so please close the game and reopen it and everything should be good!

Assets created before gamejam:

Modular SciFi Season 1 Starter Bundle (edited collision, materials and LOD)  https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/modular-scifi-season-1-st...
